original_text: And they committed whoredoms in Egypt; they committed whoredoms in their youth: there were their breasts pressed, and there they bruised the teats of their virginity.
korean_text: 그들이 애굽에서 행음하되 어렸을 때에 행음하여 그들의 유방이 눌리며 그 처녀의 가슴이 어루만져졌나니

sentences.original_text: And they committed whoredoms in Egypt
they committed whoredoms in their youth
and there they bruised the teats of their virginity
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그들은 그들의 순결한 젖꼭지를 상하게 했습니다
